alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 12:36AM MST until April 19 at 9:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM PDT /9 AM MST/ TO 9 PM PDT /9 PM MST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. A few gusts to near 60 mph possible near Red Rock Canyon. * WHERE...Most of Clark and southern Nye counties in southern Nevada, as well as the Lake Mead National Recreation Area. This includes the Las Vegas metro area. * WHEN...From 9 AM PDT /9 AM MST/ to 9 PM PDT /9 PM MST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Dangerous boating conditions expected on Lake Mead and Lake Mohave.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
